pullrequest.title: new head textures (no changes to kinematics or collision).

content.raw:
All the 3D rendering it's fine, even activating the rotation on the laser. I could not see any effect on the movements of the robot.

Aesthetically speaking I would say it does not fit very well with our current model, too dark?. Probably was designed to be integrated with pull request #240. Looks safe to merge anyway.
content.html:
All the 3D rendering it's fine, even activating the rotation on the laser. I could not see any effect on the movements of the robot.

Aesthetically speaking I would say it does not fit very well with our current model, too dark?. Probably was designed to be integrated with pull request #240. Looks safe to merge anyway.
